Title: Limelight
Writer: Charles Chaplin (original story), Charles Chaplin (screenplay by)
Actors: Charles Chaplin, Claire Bloom, Nigel Bruce, Buster Keaton
Plot: Chaplin's final American film tells the story of a fading music hall comedian's effort to help a despondent ballet dancer learn both to walk and feel confident about life again. The highlight of the film is the classic duet with Chaplin's only real artistic film comedy rival, Buster Keaton.
